name: Memorsium
description:
A,D,<-,-> - horizontal movement

SPACE to jump

Hold SHIFT to skip learning time

press ESCAPE to pause

my second ever game made in the brackeys game jam 2022.1, memory based platformer where the player has a given amount of time to memorize the map then they must traverse it with the map not there (this is how I fit it with the theme of it is not real as the platforms are not real?) there are 20 levels
